resources.string: The Examiner assistant to score evaluations
Alar means elf in the Cabécar language. This an application that works like a little pixie for teachers who use The Examiner, It helps to reduce time and human error while exams are checked.
It was developed as first project on Android in the course of Development Applications for Mobile Devices of the Computer Science Engineering career at Costa Rica Institute of Technology (TEC)
Here you have to write the test code wich is on the top of left corner of the print document
Tap here to scan each test at the time
Write the student name exactly in The Examiner desktop application
Tap SCAN to save the scan view
Do it as many times you need
Here you can check the list of students who were scanned
Tap here for send the information, a file will done and the list of student will reset
Tap it for help and about
KevinAguilar, Diseñador.\nFrancisco Torres, Creador The Examiner
